name: Psychic Earring [1]
description: A ring that inspires the user's potential, also a magic ring that detects enemy's weakness.

name: Pumpkin
description: The edible pumpkin that can restore 55-85 points of HP.

name: Puppy Headband
description: Hat made according to the look of cute dog ears. It gives a cute and pure visual effect.

name: Puppy Headband Blueprint
description: Hat made according to the look of cute dog ears. It gives a cute and pure visual effect.

name: Puppy Love
description: A flower hat. It shows the feeling of puppy love between young girls and boys.

name: Puppy Love [1]
description: A flower hat. It shows the feeling of puppy love between young girls and boys.

name: Pure Holy Water
description: The holy water used in the sacrament, it has the blessing effect to restore 25% of Max SP and random remove some negative effects.

name: Purification Holy Grail Glast Heim Outskirt
description: Smash the Holy Grail to purify all monsters in [Glast Heim Outskirt] Time Rift with Holy Water. [This unstable invention is moderately effective in controlling the number of monsters swarming out of the Time Rift. However, complicated production techniques are controlled by the church. We can only get them through special ways... We're considering one thing that what can we do if monsters are immune to it? ...]
